messages.content: You are an assistant for an HMI/tag editor on the Duro controller. You MUST respond with a single JSON OBJECT (not an array) and nothing else. The top-level JSON must have exactly these fields: message (string), steps (array of {title, details}), proposed_changes (object with hmi{views,general}, tags_to_add, components_to_add). Within proposed_changes, hmi, tags_to_add, and components_to_add can be empty if not needed.
Task: Create a view with a button incrementing a tag "numTag".

{"message":"Created a view with a button incrementing a tag \"numTag\" on each click.","steps":[{"title":"Create MainView","details":"Add a new view named 'MainView' with dimensions 1024x760."},{"title":"Add increment button","details":"Place a button (120x60 at 0,0) labeled 'Click Here' with font size 16px Arial."},{"title":"Wire button click event","details":"On click, execute writeTag(\"numTag\", numTag + 1) to increment the numTag by 1."},{"title":"Update views tree","details":"Add 'MainView' to the views tree in the HMI general settings."}],"proposed_changes":{"hmi":{"views":[{"id":"vw_2055d1e1-b1824a47","name":"MainView","type":"view","config":{"width":1024,"height":760,"style":{},"sizeMode":"normal"},"components":[{"id":"btn_568f-dda9","viewId":"","type":"button","typeAbbr":"btn_","comptName":"Button_1","visibility":true,"w":120,"h":60,"y":0,"x":0,"zIndex":0,"rotationAngle":0,"sizeMode":"zoom","config":{"behavior":"release","text":"Click Here","style":{"fontFamily":"Arial","font-weight":"normal","fontSize.px":16,"color":"#000000a3","borderRadius.px":5},"placeholderType":"text"},"animation":{"backgroundColor":"","border":"","text":"","visibility":"","color":""},"events":{"click":"writeTag(\"numTag\", numTag + 1)","press":"","release":""}}]}],"general":{"viewsTree":[{"name":"MainView","type":"view","id":"vw_2055d1e1-b1824a47"}]}},"components_to_add":[],"tags_to_add":[]}}

Within proposed_changes, hmi, tags_to_add, and components_to_add can be empty if not needed.
Task: Create a view with a label displaying "Hello World".

{"message":"Created a view with a label displaying \"Hello, World!\"","steps":[{"title":"Create MainView","details":"Add a new view named 'MainView' with dimensions 1024x760."},{"title":"Add label component","details":"Place a label (120x60 at 0,0) with placeholder text 'Hello, World!' using font size 16px Arial."},{"title":"Update views tree","details":"Add 'MainView' to the views tree in the HMI general settings."}],"proposed_changes":{"hmi":{"views":[{"id":"vw_2055d1e1-b1824a47","name":"MainView","type":"view","config":{"width":1024,"height":760,"style":{},"sizeMode":"normal"},"components":[{"id":"lbl_01e3-1dd2","viewId":"","type":"label","typeAbbr":"lbl_","comptName":"Label_1","visibility":true,"w":120,"h":60,"y":0,"x":0,"zIndex":0,"rotationAngle":0,"sizeMode":"zoom","config":{"placeholder":"Hello, World!","buttonMode":"false","style":{"justify-content":"center","align-items":"center","fontFamily":"Arial","font-weight":"normal","fontSize.px":16,"color":"#000000","borderRadius.px":0,"box-shadow":"0px 0px 0px 0px #000000","feedback-fx":"scale(0.95) rgba(0) 0s","border":"solid #000000 0px","backgroundColor":"#ffffff00"}},"animation":{"backgroundColor":"","border":"","text":"","visibility":"","color":""},"events":{"click":""}}]}],"general":{"viewsTree":[{"name":"MainView","type":"view","id":"vw_2055d1e1-b1824a47"}]}},"components_to_add":[],"tags_to_add":[]}}

Task: Create a view with a button.

{"message":"Created a view with a button","steps":[{"title":"Create MainView","details":"Add a new view named 'MainView' with dimensions 1024x760."},{"title":"Add button component","details":"Place a button (120x60 at 0,0), default placeholder 'Click Here' using font size 16px Arial."},{"title":"Update views tree","details":"Add 'MainView' to the views tree in the HMI general settings."}],"proposed_changes":{"hmi":{"views":[{"id":"vw_dc27e6e7-99ad43b6","name":"MainView","type":"view","config":{"width":1024,"height":760,"style":{},"sizeMode":"normal"},"components":[{"id":"btn_d63a-b6ae","viewId":"","type":"button","typeAbbr":"btn_","comptName":"Button_1","visibility":true,"w":120,"h":60,"y":0,"x":0,"zIndex":0,"rotationAngle":0,"sizeMode":"zoom","config":{"behavior":"release","text":"Click Here","style":{"fontFamily":"Arial","font-weight":"normal","fontSize.px":16,"color":"#000000","borderRadius.px":0,"border":"solid #000000 0px","feedback-fx":"scale(0.95) rgba(0) 0s","box-shadow":"0px 0px 0px 0px #000000","backgroundColor":"#d3d3d3"},"placeholderType":"text"},"animation":{"backgroundColor":"","border":"","text":"","visibility":"","color":""},"events":{"click":"","press":"","release":""},"logic":{"moduleId":"","mainTag":"","mainTagResp":""}}]}],"general":{"viewsTree":[{"name":"MainView","type":"view","id":"vw_dc27e6e7-99ad43b6"}]}},"components_to_add":[],"tags_to_add":[]}}

Task: Create a view with a label in the middle of the screen, with tag "textTag".

{"message":"Created a view with a label in the center of view, displaying tag \"textTag\"","steps":[{"title":"Create MainView","details":"Add a new view named 'MainView' with dimensions 1024x760."},{"title":"Add label component","details":"Place a label (120x60 at 452,350)"},{"title":"Bind label to tag","details":"Set the label's animation.text to display the value of the tag 'textTag'."},{"title":"Update views tree","details":"Add 'MainView' to the views tree in the HMI general settings."}],"proposed_changes":{"hmi":{"views":[{"id":"vw_dc27e6e7-99ad43b6","name":"MainView","type":"view","config":{"width":1024,"height":760,"style":{},"sizeMode":"normal"},"components":[{"id":"lbl_522c-343d","viewId":"","type":"label","typeAbbr":"lbl_","comptName":"Label_1","visibility":true,"w":120,"h":60,"y":350,"x":452,"zIndex":0,"rotationAngle":0,"sizeMode":"zoom","config":{"placeholder":"","buttonMode":"false","style":{"justify-content":"center","align-items":"center","fontFamily":"Arial","font-weight":"normal","fontSize.px":16,"color":"#000000","backgroundColor":"#ffffff00","borderRadius.px":0,"border":"solid #000000 0px","feedback-fx":"scale(0.95) rgba(0) 0s","box-shadow":"0px 0px 0px 0px #000000"}},"animation":{"backgroundColor":"","border":"","text":"textTag","visibility":"","color":""},"events":{"click":""}}]}],"general":{"viewsTree":[{"name":"MainView","type":"view","id":"vw_dc27e6e7-99ad43b6"}]}},"components_to_add":[],"tags_to_add":[]}}

Task: Create a view with a button writing "TESTING" to tag "Folder.Folder.tag".

{"message":"Created a view with a button that writes the value \"TESTING\" to the tag \"Folder.Folder.tag\" when clicked.","steps":[{"title":"Create View","details":"Add a new view named 'View' with dimensions 1024x760."},{"title":"Add button component","details":"Place a button (120x60 at 0,0) with text 'Click Here'."},{"title":"Configure button click event","details":"Set the button's click event to write the value 'TESTING' to the tag 'Folder.Folder.tag'."},{"title":"Update views tree","details":"Add 'View' to the views tree in the HMI general settings."}],"proposed_changes":{"hmi":{"views":[{"id":"vw_d9bcef30-2e7c4443","name":"View","type":"view","config":{"width":1024,"height":760,"style":{},"sizeMode":"normal"},"components":[{"id":"btn_3634-96fe","viewId":"","type":"button","typeAbbr":"btn_","comptName":"Button_1","visibility":true,"w":120,"h":60,"y":0,"x":0,"zIndex":0,"rotationAngle":0,"sizeMode":"zoom","config":{"behavior":"release","text":"Click Here","style":{"fontFamily":"Arial","font-weight":"normal","fontSize.px":16,"color":"#000000","backgroundColor":"#b0b0b0","borderRadius.px":0,"border":"solid #000000 0px","feedback-fx":"scale(0.95) rgba(0) 0s","box-shadow":"0px 0px 0px 0px #000000"},"placeholderType":"text"},"animation":{"backgroundColor":"","border":"","text":"","visibility":"","color":""},"events":{"click":"writeTag(\"Folder.Folder.tag\", \"TESTING\")","press":"","release":""}}]}],"general":{"viewsTree":[{"name":"View","type":"view","id":"vw_d9bcef30-2e7c4443"}]}},"components_to_add":[],"tags_to_add":[]}}

Task: Create a view with a button displaying the tag "displayMe".

{"message":"Created a view with a button that displays the value of tag \"displayMe\".","steps":[{"title":"Create View","details":"Add a new view named 'View' with dimensions 1024x760."},{"title":"Add button component","details":"Place a button (120x60 at 0,0) with no text in placeholder."},{"title":"Bind button text to tag","details":"Set the button's animation.text to display the value of the tag 'displayMe'."},{"title":"Update views tree","details":"Add 'View' to the views tree in the HMI general settings."}],"proposed_changes":{"hmi":{"views":[{"id":"vw_d9bcef30-2e7c4443","name":"View","type":"view","config":{"width":1024,"height":760,"style":{},"sizeMode":"normal"},"components":[{"id":"btn_607f-b7b1","viewId":"","type":"button","typeAbbr":"btn_","comptName":"Button_1","visibility":true,"w":120,"h":60,"y":0,"x":0,"zIndex":0,"rotationAngle":0,"sizeMode":"zoom","config":{"behavior":"release","text":"","style":{"fontFamily":"Arial","font-weight":"normal","fontSize.px":16,"color":"#000000","backgroundColor":"#d3d3d3","borderRadius.px":0,"border":"solid #000000 0px","feedback-fx":"scale(0.95) rgba(0) 0s","box-shadow":"0px 0px 0px 0px #000000"},"placeholderType":"text"},"animation":{"backgroundColor":"","border":"","text":"displayMe","visibility":"","color":""},"events":{"click":"","press":"","release":""}}]}],"general":{"viewsTree":[{"name":"View","type":"view","id":"vw_d9bcef30-2e7c4443"}]}},"components_to_add":[],"tags_to_add":[]}}

Task: Create a Button saying "ON", and when click on, write 1 to tag "hmi_system_1.on".

{"message":"Created a button that writes 1 to tag \"hmi_system_1.on\" when clicked.","steps":[{"title":"Add button component","details":"Place a button (120x60 at 0,0) with placeholder text 'ON'."},{"title":"Configure button click event","details":"Set the button's click event to write the value 1 to the tag 'hmi_system_1.on'."},{"title":"Update views tree","details":"Add 'View' to the views tree in the HMI general settings."}],"proposed_changes":{"hmi":{},"components_to_add":[{"id":"btn_607f-b7b1","viewId":"","type":"button","typeAbbr":"btn_","comptName":"Button_1","visibility":true,"w":120,"h":60,"y":0,"x":0,"zIndex":0,"rotationAngle":0,"sizeMode":"zoom","config":{"behavior":"release","text":"ON","style":{"fontFamily":"Arial","font-weight":"normal","fontSize.px":16,"color":"#000000","backgroundColor":"#d3d3d3","borderRadius.px":0,"border":"solid #000000 0px","feedback-fx":"scale(0.95) rgba(0) 0s","box-shadow":"0px 0px 0px 0px #000000"},"placeholderType":"text"},"animation":{"backgroundColor":"","border":"","text":"","visibility":"","color":""},"events":{"click":"writeTag(\"hmi_system_1.on\", 1)","press":"","release":""}}],"tags_to_add":[]}}
